unnormalised: Arre, aiklaṁ Tata Sons haka Companies Act, 2013 chya Section 241 antargat notice ailya – gambhir corporate law vishe asha, bhai! Ashi asa ki te 31/12 mhali-mhali sodvonk pavta, te adim.
normalised: Arre, aiklam Tata Sons haka Section two hundred and forty one Companies Act, two thousand and thirteen hachea khal notice ailea – gambhir corporate law vixoi, bhai! Asha kortam tim zata zata sodoun kaddttelim, ektris December date-poriant.
text: Arre, aiklaṁ Tata Sons haka Companies Act, 2013 chya Section 241 antargat notice ailya – gambhir corporate law vishe asha, bhai! Ashi asa ki te 31/12 mhali-mhali sodvonk pavta, te adim.
